attributes.action: Recover the billions spent on buying US government debt and use them on the UK economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK government has purchased US government debt. Between July 2008 and July 2009 this debt rose from $66 billion to $220 billion. During this time the UK economy has been in recession and over 3 million people are now unemployed. The money used to purchase US government debt should be recovered immediately and used to invest in the UK economy to save British jobs and lower our national debt.
